Sentencas: Electrophoretic deposition has acquired increasing interest for its outstanding potential to produce thick ceramic coatings on complex-shaped substrates.
Titulo: Optimization of Electrophoretic Deposition of YSZ

Sentencas: This makes electrophoretic deposition a promising technique to obtain ceramic coatings for several applications such as solid oxide fuel cells, thermal barrier coatings and biomaterials.
Titulo: Optimization of Electrophoretic Deposition of YSZ

Sentencas: Response surface methodology was used to model and optimize the electrophoretic deposition process.
Titulo: Optimization of Electrophoretic Deposition of YSZ

Sentencas: Three mathematical models were derived to understand the kinetics of electrophoretic deposition.
Titulo: Optimization of Electrophoretic Deposition of YSZ

Sentencas: The optimization results showed that applied voltage had significant effects on the packing density of YSZ particles.
Titulo: Optimization of Electrophoretic Deposition of YSZ
